reviews.review: idk man

PROS:
- Graphics are still good. You can compare them to Half-Life.
- The ideia of the game is awesome, using portals and your head to succeed.
- If you like games that feed on your logic and thinking this is a good one for your library.
- It´s comic, has evil and at the same time fun sarcasm through the game. (A lot less than Portal 2)
- It has achievements like every game should have to keep the player even more motivated.
- I haven´t found a bug.

CONS:
- The story is really small, I finished it in only 2 hours. Though you can still play the bonus maps to get more time.

Overhaul, this is a good game for someone who likes puzzle and thinking games,  for me it´s worth it only in promotion (I bough it for 1,99), you can expect minimum 2 hours of story content but you can get more through bonus maps, and this is considering you beat the game without getting stuck at levels.
If you cannot spend much money just get Portal 2, it´s a lot better, but if you can, get both.
Follow me for more reviews.

Portal is an awesome game. What  i like about Portal is making portals and travelling through them. The puzzles are fun. I did try to solve the puzzles myself. I bought Portal  and Portal 2 together.

Thank you Valve and Steam for making this game available to play.

Good game. It's very short, 3-7~ hours depending on your playstyle and how often you get stuck. Maybe 10+ hours with the challenges, advanced levels, and developer commentary. But it's a fun game, you'll be smiling at the end credits. It's worth a playthru.
A game you need to play, especially if you plan on making games.

Although rather short compared to its sequel, Portal is an amazing game. It’s puzzles are clever and fun, it’s story is compelling, and GLaDOS is just my absolute favorite pessimistic robot in all of gaming. You should absolutely play through this at least once.

Bien trop court mais c'est normal, c'était pas censé être un vrai jeu à la base. Le gameplay est génial, et le jeu est plutôt beau, même moi qui ai un PC de merde, le jeu est hyper fluide et j'ai aucune perte de FPS. Un peu cher hors solde, 8euros pour 4H de jeu à peu près c'est cher.
Best game ever!

PLAY IT!
It is an amazing example of what a good starter game for the PC is. PLAY THIS GAME! Puzzles slowly getting harder, and yet have the time of your life as you fall for all of GLaDOS' dry humor jokes, and fall in love with the cutest Turrets. Also.... JUST PLAY IT!!!

Esta y la segunda parte son por lo que creo que los videojuegos no son solo productos. Innovador para su tiempo aunque eso no es novedad en VALVE. Tienes que tenerlo y jugarlo por lo menos una vez, la segunda parte ni me molesto en recomendarla porque ganas te van a sobrar luego de jugar la primera.

I can not say this enough. In my opinion, this is the BEST GAME EVER MADE.

- The storyline is so incredibly rich and intriguing.

- The gameplay is so creative and fresh, even in 2020.

- This game made me cry, rage, and rejoice all in 6 hours of gameplay.

- If Valve ever even CONSIDERS Portal 3, I will Pre-pre-order that RIGHT AWAY.

In conculsion, Portal and Portal 2 are the most inventive and overally best games ever made.

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: DO ANOTHER ONE!

FPSes...eseses... are definitely more unique when Shooting takes a backseat in favour of puzzle solving and lateral thinking. With that in mind, it is clear why Portal has stood the test of time. I solid recommendation ijn my book.

Now granted... the challenges go well outside my realm of cognitive puzzle solving, but they are a welcome expansion on the concepts at play if Portal 2 isn't your immediate cup of tea to jump forward in the "franchise". Again, these games have so many challenge maps and expansions that it feels like a third game isn't beyond comprehension... fingers crossed.
A must play for sure.
